Name: distal spinal muscular atrophy 1
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of severe respiratory distress resulting from diaphragmatic paralysis that predominantly involves the upper limbs and distal muscles that has_material_basis_in  homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the IGHMBP2 gene on chromosome 11q13.
Synonym: spinal muscular atrophy with respiratory distress type 1
Output: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy

Name: distal spinal muscular atrophy 2
Definition: A spinal muscular atrophy characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of distal muscle weakness and muscle wasting primarily affecting the upper and lower limbswith onset typically in the first decade of life that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the SIGMAR1 gene on chromosome 9p13.
Output: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy

Name: distal spinal muscular atrophy type 3
Definition: An autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy characterized by juvenile onset of distal muscle weakness and wasting with variable severity that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in a 2.6-cM region of chromosome 11q13.3.
Output: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy

Name: distal spinal muscular atrophy type 4
Definition: An autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy characterized by onset in early childhood of rapidly progressing proximal muscle weakness with an early involvement of foot and hand muscles that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in PLEKHG5 on 1p36.31.
Output: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy

Name: distal spinal muscular atrophy type 5
Definition: A autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy characterized by young adult onset of slowly progressive distal muscle weakness and atrophy resulting in gait impairment and loss of reflexes that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in DNAJB2 on 2q35.
Synonym: young adult-onset distal hereditary motor neuropathy
Output: autosomal recessive distal hereditary motor neuronopathy
